name: Nebby Neighbour
description:
Keep your garden in good condition to stop your nosy neighbour from complaining to the authorities (the neighbours' name is randomised each playthrough!).

Maintain your CHICKENS, TRASH, FENCE and PLANTS.

If they hit zero, it's game over! Last for 10 DAYS to win!

Click on EGGS to collect them, then spend them on tools. Select a tool from the bottom tool-bar and click on the correct item to use it.

Use SEED to keep chickens happy

Use TRASH BAGS to clean up trash

Use PAINT to paint your fence

Use WATER to water the plants

Pests can enter your garden at night.

FOXES will make your chickens unhappy quicker.

RACCOONS will make your garden have more trash.

Use PEST-AWAY to get rid of pests.

---------------------------

Made in 48 hours for Spring 2D Jam 2022. Design/code/gameplay by Theo. Art and voice acting by Zaetu/Loucozade.
